articles.title: Gold gains further ground as Fed’s tightening debate intensifies, more volatility ahead

articles.title: Retail inflation for industrial workers moderates to 6.16% in June
articles.description: The all-India CPI-IW (consumer price index for industrial workers) for June 2022 witnessed an increase by 0.2 points and came in at 129.2 points. The CPI-IW in May was 129 points.
articles.content:
The retail inflation for industrial workers came down to 6.16 percent in June, from 6.97 per cent in May 2022, owing to lower prices food and fuel.
